thread.title: 2018 Toyota Sienna: Updated Looks and Tech to Go with Updated Powertrain
thread.title_full: 2018 Toyota Sienna: Updated Looks and Tech to Go with Updated Powertrain

author: Greg Fink
title: 2018 Toyota Sienna: Updated Looks and Tech to Go with Updated Powertrain
text:
-As far as we can tell, Toyota wants you to think of its Sienna as the Jay-Z of minivans. Like Hov on the song “Otis,” Toyota claims the Sienna has its swagger back—you know, the same swagger it was claimed to have in the somewhat groan-worthy “swagger wagon” ad campaign from several years ago. READ MORE ›› 
-
